list: Create a secure 6-digit PIN
Set up biometric authentication (optional)

content: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your login credentials. Klat-32 is not responsible for any loss or damage arising from unauthorized access due to your negligence.

list: Funding your wallet using debit cards, bank transfers, or USSD
Sending and receiving money to and from other Klat-32 users
Withdrawing funds to your linked bank account
Paying for products and services via in-app chat or merchant profiles

content: All payment services are processed securely. Klat-32 may delay, reverse, or investigate suspicious or high-risk transactions.

list: Merchant onboarding with business verification
